Spike has been developed in corporation with end users and is the first solution in the market that makes it possible to steer and create forward power simultaneously. Spike has been well accepted from the market as it can be individually adapted to each end-user and has a sporty and unique design. It is now ready to be launched to the market in Norway through paying customer the Norwegian Welfare system. Our goal is to develop new solutions in a market with huge potential by focusing on functionality, individual adaption and design. The Why Everyone should be able to have the same possibilities to stay active and live a happy lifestyle. At Exero we want to make this possible.

Zabai Online Learning is a cloud-based solution that enables you to efficiently administrate training and competence your learners. Our solution is designed to meet the needs of local organizations and learners in developing countries. Zabai Online Learning gives access to a generic course catalogue with a variety of courses relevant for young people in developing countries and available in local languages. Zabai's mission is to deliver modern learning experiences that improve the learners performance. We have two decades of experience to develop interactive learning programs that engage learners and accelerate skills development, including web-based training, video based training, mobile learning apps and blended training.
OKO (Israel) is crop insurance designed for emerging markets, using new technologies in satellite imagery and weather forecasting to simplify and automate claim management.
Solar Freeze (Kenya) is pioneering mobile cold storage units powered by renewable energy for smallholder farmers, to help them reduce post-harvest loss in the developing world.

Leaf is a global, virtual bank for vulnerable populations crossing borders.
They developed a blockchain-based money management solution for refugees and migrants to store, send, and exchange money globally without requiring a smartphone or internet.
Leaf stores and transports assets across borders from a mobile device—no smartphone required. Refugees and migrants can journey without cash, knowing accounts are safe and accessible globally. Leaf enables customers to digitally store savings, receive deposits from abroad, and manage money from a mobile device no matter where they go. Digitizing services drastically reduces exchange and transfer fees for customers.

Leaf Global Fintech's Story
Leaf’s CEO, Nat Robinson, spent nearly seven years starting and running a successful microfinance company in Kenya. He is passionate about using technology to provide financial services to the unbanked around the world. Leaf’s CTO, Tori Samples, has fifteen years of personal experience working with resettled refugees in addition to a professional career in technology. She is passionate about building solutions to help refugees connect with loved ones and create a community.

Platform that brings together those who need help with those who want to help. eSolidar is an innovative online platform for people to support the causes they really care about.

They are a dynamic team that is passionate about developing technology and creating social impact. Their focus is to harness these tools to create an online community that benefits charities around the world.

It is their goal at eSolidar to be the all-encompassing way for charities to fundraise online in a timely and cost-effective way, creating an online community that can help charities from the bottom up.

eSolidar brings a supportive community together in one convenient place. They are committed to transparency and the communities they serve.

eSolidar's Story
They intend to be the largest digital social community, a platform where projects can find help quickly and globally so that we can have a fairer world and where everyone has the same opportunities.

eSolidar team believes that technology is a fundamental means to support the fight against inequality and that is why every day they work to create tools that facilitate the connection of people who want to help, with those who need help.

Increasing the transparency of the application of the financial resources that are donated is also one of their priorities so that they can generate confidence in the process and increase the frequency and value of donations.
Grou is a platform that connects small producers and buyers, diminishing food waste and increasing income for farmers.

Vista Volcanes, S.A. develops and commercializes agricultural technology systems developed via extensive research, with the objective of promoting the transition from conventional agriculture to organic and protected agriculture.
Advanced BioControllers researches, develops, and sells environmentally-friendly biopesticides to control pests and increase agricultural productivity.
Apic.ai (Germany) uses honeybees as biosensors in the fight to protect biodiversity.
Solar Freeze (Kenya) is pioneering mobile cold storage units powered by renewable energy for smallholder farmers, to help them reduce post-harvest loss in the developing world.

Rolela is a virtual market place for expiring food items. Vendors like f. ex. supermarkets, shops, restaurants, farmers, etc. can offer their expiring food items via their website/app to end-users and other vendors applying a discount or offer these for free to charity users. Their service is free of charge for end-users and charity users, vendors pay a monthly subscription fee for our services.

Rolela's Story
Rolela was founded in 2017 by Jerry Schu and Peter Schalk! They both have over 10 years of experience in technical support for companies like IBM, HPE, and SAP. They have a passion for simple and easy-to-use IT solutions and have been since long intrigued by the question of food waste so they decided to create Rolela.
Kirón develops medical articles focused on improving the quality of life of its clients and social inclusion of people with disabilities.
Pegasi created 20/20, the first Latin American Electronic Health Record Platform (EHRP), optimizing the management of clinico-administrative information for over 16,000,000 patients in 5 years.

Estación Vital empowers populations to monitor their health by providing preventative evaluations through an integrated platform available in kiosks, and concurrently helps companies to communicate with their most relevant customers.
Freshwater Solutions seeks to improve the quality of life of people that do not have access to safe, good-quality water by producing and selling purified and sustainable water sourced from the air.
Flare (Kenya) offers software infrastructure and operational support for medical emergency response services in Sub-Saharan Africa.
mDoc (Nigeria) uses a digital platform and in-person hubs to support people living with chronic diseases.
Wondertree (Pakistan) accelerates cognitive and motor development in children with special needs through movement-based therapeutic and educational AR games.
ASHONPLAFA offers family planning, and sexual and reproductive health services and products.
Belize Family Life Association is a 21st century response to your family's sexual and reproductive health.
Broterra industrializes raw materials from overlooked sectors of society to create a range of healthy and organic foods.
Centro de Líder teaches pragmatic transformation based on mindfulness to leaders and organizations for greater performance, wellness and purpose.

Diagnochip is a Chilean startup company focused in the development of rapid antibiotic sensitivity kits to be used at the point of care and getting results faster than conventional antibiogram ( 8 hours versus 3 – to 4 days)

Diagnochip's Story
Diagnochip has developed and patented in Chile a medical device named Rapid Antibiotic Sensitivity Kit to be used in patients with urinary tract infections (UTI).
This is a common disease worldwide, affecting particularly women and elderly people, and to treat it correctly it is necessary to have an antibiogram.
In developing countries and rural zones, it is difficult to do an antibiogram, because labs and medical staff are not available 24/7 or simply medical service does not exist.

Develop Diverse is the world’s first software tool that automatically analyses stereotypic content for gender, age, and ethnicity in texts and proposes non-stereotypic alternatives.

Scientific studies have proven that the use of stereotypic language when writing job ads is common practice, and this has a psychological effect on potential applicants. Such language makes these job ads biased towards specific demographic groups, discouraging other groups from applying and this effect can reduce the applicant pool by as much as 50%.

Their solution, the DD-scan is an AI-based software tool that promotes inclusive writing which will enable you to reach a wider and more diverse talent pool. The DD-scan detects and color-highlights implicitly and explicitly stereotypic language in your texts and suggests neutral alternatives in real-time. This way, their customers have attracted 3x more qualified candidates regardless of gender, ethnicity, or age, and save time on recruitment.

Their vision is to empower companies to make diversity the new norm in every company.

Develop Diverse's Story
Many agree that by making everyone aware of their own unconscious biases we can change how gender and other social categories are perceived and represented in the workplace. However, getting rid of unconscious bias implies a mentality change, which requires 100 more years to be achieved. Develop Diverse has been founded with the purpose of building a tech platform for helping recruiters speed up the process of achieving gender balance and diversity in their workplace. This technology focuses on removing stereotypes in recruitment and communication content to make all the language inclusive and thus enabling recruiters to hire talent efficiently.

Cure Bionic is a bionic startup that aims to make amazing and customizable 3D-printed bionic arms for people with limb differences. These prosthetics are customizable thanks to removable covers, having rotating wrist, easy to use thanks to a smart algorithm, adjustable since children grow fast, having wireless/solar charger, and will be sold for an affordable price.
They also aim to provide them with an entertaining and immersive therapeutic solution that uses virtual reality and gamification allowing them, using a VR headset and a muscle bracelet, to see and control a virtual hand for training and rehabilitation via gamified exercises while the doctor can do the online follow up from his office while getting real-time and accurate data.

Cure Bionics's Story
It all started in 2016 when they participated in a student challenge to solve problems in relation to the SDGs. One of the team members at that time had a cousin who was born without both her upper limbs and her parents couldn’t afford to buy her prosthetics until she reaches the age of 20 and her morphology stops growing. They made a mechanical prosthetic device at that time but we, unfortunately, didn’t agree to continue.

Mohammed, the founder of Cure Bionic, decided to take it as his graduation project in 2017 instead of a paid internship in Canada and I used his family’s financial resources to rebuild a bionic arm from scratch. It took him 8 months where he met many people with limb differences and started having them as friends. He was visiting a hospital in Tunisia where they take care of children with amputation and met an 8-year child who was electrified and lost both his right hand and leg, he was in pain, and his mum was so in a very bad situation since they cannot afford to buy a prosthetic hand for him. That day, Mohammed took a decision to address children with amputation who did not have access to these devices because they are not made small enough, because their parents cannot afford to supply them with it since it is so expensive or because existing prosthetics will not reflect their personality and preferences to make them feel proud of having such devices. He took the decision to give them more than a device, but a way to inspire the world with their positive differences.

Astrek Innovations built a lower limb exosuit developed to aid patients with walking disabilities in their therapies and to perform simple utilitarian tasks. Their device incorporates sensors and motion analysis to recognize walking patterns. The device is intended to provide paraplegics with a comfortable walk on indoor spaces to help them access toilets and other utilities in a home/office environment. This reduces the terrain variations and the complexities associated with it, bringing down the cost of the product.

Astrek Innovation's Story
They started working on this startup after having a personal accident. Astrek Innovations team used to work together in a volunteering organization and they used to work together for 5 years. Two years back the grandfather of Robin, one of the founders, had an accident. He was a really healthy and independent man, but after the accident, he couldn’t walk again. After doing the operation in records he was completely healthy to walk, but he didn’t. They used to carry him to the toilets, he was no more independent.

Astrek Innovations team used to develop assistive devices for daily living for specially-abled schools back then. They thought they will use rehabilitation solutions to make him walk but everything was costly and they couldn’t use anything. They came up together to develop a solution to this. Robin’s grandfather died two years back but they are working on this because they see so many people around them and they want to bring changes in their life.

Develop Diverse is the world’s first software tool that automatically analyses stereotypic content for gender, age, and ethnicity in texts and proposes non-stereotypic alternatives.

Scientific studies have proven that the use of stereotypic language when writing job ads is common practice, and this has a psychological effect on potential applicants. Such language makes these job ads biased towards specific demographic groups, discouraging other groups from applying and this effect can reduce the applicant pool by as much as 50%.

Their solution, the DD-scan is an AI-based software tool that promotes inclusive writing which will enable you to reach a wider and more diverse talent pool. The DD-scan detects and color-highlights implicitly and explicitly stereotypic language in your texts and suggests neutral alternatives in real-time. This way, their customers have attracted 3x more qualified candidates regardless of gender, ethnicity, or age, and save time on recruitment.

Their vision is to empower companies to make diversity the new norm in every company.

Develop Diverse's Story
Many agree that by making everyone aware of their own unconscious biases we can change how gender and other social categories are perceived and represented in the workplace. However, getting rid of unconscious bias implies a mentality change, which requires 100 more years to be achieved. Develop Diverse has been founded with the purpose of building a tech platform for helping recruiters speed up the process of achieving gender balance and diversity in their workplace. This technology focuses on removing stereotypes in recruitment and communication content to make all the language inclusive and thus enabling recruiters to hire talent efficiently.
Knight Soluciones offers ecological cleaning services for companies and vehicles based on microencapsulation technology, allowing it to provide its services without using a drop of water.
Iluminando Col SAS provides sustainable, safe, reliable and economical lighting solutions to populations of non-interconnected zones or with difficult access to energy.
Inventive Power develops concentrated solar technologies for thermal energy generation aimed to substitute fossil fuel usage in industry applications.
Solar Freeze (Kenya) is pioneering mobile cold storage units powered by renewable energy for smallholder farmers, to help them reduce post-harvest loss in the developing world.

B.O.T (Bridge. Outsource. Transform) is an impact sourcing platform that provides high-quality digital services executed by skilled freelancers from marginalized communities in Lebanon.

B.O.T 's Story
Their aim is to ensure disadvantaged youth and women have access to global and local digital work, giving them the platform to work their way up while securing a source of income.
Faro Corporation S.A.C. comercializes clean technologies through a distribution network of trained comunal entrepreneurs.
Pegasi created 20/20, the first Latin American Electronic Health Record Platform (EHRP), optimizing the management of clinico-administrative information for over 16,000,000 patients in 5 years.
Inventive Power develops concentrated solar technologies for thermal energy generation aimed to substitute fossil fuel usage in industry applications.
Flare (Kenya) offers software infrastructure and operational support for medical emergency response services in Sub-Saharan Africa.

Astrek Innovations built a lower limb exosuit developed to aid patients with walking disabilities in their therapies and to perform simple utilitarian tasks. Their device incorporates sensors and motion analysis to recognize walking patterns. The device is intended to provide paraplegics with a comfortable walk on indoor spaces to help them access toilets and other utilities in a home/office environment. This reduces the terrain variations and the complexities associated with it, bringing down the cost of the product.

Astrek Innovation's Story
They started working on this startup after having a personal accident. Astrek Innovations team used to work together in a volunteering organization and they used to work together for 5 years. Two years back the grandfather of Robin, one of the founders, had an accident. He was a really healthy and independent man, but after the accident, he couldn’t walk again. After doing the operation in records he was completely healthy to walk, but he didn’t. They used to carry him to the toilets, he was no more independent.

Astrek Innovations team used to develop assistive devices for daily living for specially-abled schools back then. They thought they will use rehabilitation solutions to make him walk but everything was costly and they couldn’t use anything. They came up together to develop a solution to this. Robin’s grandfather died two years back but they are working on this because they see so many people around them and they want to bring changes in their life.

Cure Bionic is a bionic startup that aims to make amazing and customizable 3D-printed bionic arms for people with limb differences. These prosthetics are customizable thanks to removable covers, having rotating wrist, easy to use thanks to a smart algorithm, adjustable since children grow fast, having wireless/solar charger, and will be sold for an affordable price.
They also aim to provide them with an entertaining and immersive therapeutic solution that uses virtual reality and gamification allowing them, using a VR headset and a muscle bracelet, to see and control a virtual hand for training and rehabilitation via gamified exercises while the doctor can do the online follow up from his office while getting real-time and accurate data.

Cure Bionics's Story
It all started in 2016 when they participated in a student challenge to solve problems in relation to the SDGs. One of the team members at that time had a cousin who was born without both her upper limbs and her parents couldn’t afford to buy her prosthetics until she reaches the age of 20 and her morphology stops growing. They made a mechanical prosthetic device at that time but we, unfortunately, didn’t agree to continue.

Mohammed, the founder of Cure Bionic, decided to take it as his graduation project in 2017 instead of a paid internship in Canada and I used his family’s financial resources to rebuild a bionic arm from scratch. It took him 8 months where he met many people with limb differences and started having them as friends. He was visiting a hospital in Tunisia where they take care of children with amputation and met an 8-year child who was electrified and lost both his right hand and leg, he was in pain, and his mum was so in a very bad situation since they cannot afford to buy a prosthetic hand for him. That day, Mohammed took a decision to address children with amputation who did not have access to these devices because they are not made small enough, because their parents cannot afford to supply them with it since it is so expensive or because existing prosthetics will not reflect their personality and preferences to make them feel proud of having such devices. He took the decision to give them more than a device, but a way to inspire the world with their positive differences.

Estación Vital empowers populations to monitor their health by providing preventative evaluations through an integrated platform available in kiosks, and concurrently helps companies to communicate with their most relevant customers.
Freshwater Solutions seeks to improve the quality of life of people that do not have access to safe, good-quality water by producing and selling purified and sustainable water sourced from the air.
Kit Urbano educates consumers about waste separation and management through an interactive mobile app, providing, among other things, information on waste types and recycling locations.

BirdShades develops a transparent, high-tech window film to save billions of birds worldwide from deadly collisions with the glass surfaces of buildings. The need to make windows safe for birds is growing drastically due to increasing legislation. The solutions available on the market are either not effective against bird window collisions or affect the transparency of the glass massively.

BirdShades's Story
The story of BirdShades started with a freezer full of dead birds. A biology professor at their University collected them on the campus for further identification. The cause of death was clear: Bird strikes. The glass area was small but hundreds of birds crashed against it. They asked themselves how many birds would collide in the entire city? – and they knew we had to do something against this preventable and unnecessary death of so many birds. So, the idea for BirdShades was born.
Since then, their research has shown that billions of birds die worldwide. Some countries and cities have already implemented laws or guidelines to stop bird-window collisions such as Canada and in the US the city of New York. They found out that the bird stickers on windows don’t work, but why? Birds can see the stickers but try to fly past them because they do not perceive the glass panes as obstacles. The only thing that can help is a close-spaced pattern like dots or stripes. Of course, nobody wants to have something like this on their windows. That is why they have set themselves the goal of finding an invisible solution for people. Birds are also able to see wavelengths in the UV range. They work together with scientists from various universities to develop a window film that makes a coating with UV reflective paint invisible to people and visible to birds to protect them. Currently, they are testing our high-tech film at various locations and have sold it as a beta version via their pilot customer program.

Airlief is a Bulgarian startup company focused on tackling the problem of air pollution. Their mission is to prevent diseases caused by air pollution and to improve the lives of all people living in environments with poor air quality.

In November 2019, AirLief Mask came on the market. While it developed into a local institution AirLief is establishing itself as a brand known for its style and authenticity. For a few months after its start, AirLief has happy customers around Europe, the USA, India, Singapore, Kyrgyzstan, and China.

AirLief's Story
Petar, the founder of Airlief, has asthma from a very early age. This has always been a problem while growing up. However, only after he spent a couple of years in Asia he realized the impact poor air quality has on people with respiratory problems like him. After he returned from Asia back to Europe he was obsessed with the idea to create a product that helps people breathe and feel better.

Voiceitt builds speech recognition technology designed to understand speech impairments, disorders, or disabilities.

Our core mobile application enables face-to-face, real-time communication with friends, family, and strangers, and integration with smart homes, Assistive and Augmentative Communication devices, and smart speakers.
Beehome: earth's first autonomous beehive, allowing the upkeep of bees without any human intervention.

Amai Proteins ('Amai' is 'sweet' in Japanese) cures the food we eat and beverages we drink by presenting healthy and tasty protein ingredients for everyday use. The Designer Protein Company first focus is Sweet Designer Proteins as sugar substitutes. Amai is taking sweet proteins found along the equatorial belt and applies Agile Integrative Computational Protein Design (AI-CPD) and fermentation to make the proteins fit for the mass food market.

​

The novel non-GMO ingredients, are healthy (zero calories, zero glycemic index), tasty, cheaper than sugar (in sweetness units), widely food-compatible, scalable, sustainable, and environmentally friendly.

​

Amai made the world’s sweetest protein which is also thermostable, tasty and applicable to the mass food market.

MobileODT is driven by a mission: to deliver affordable, practical healthcare innovation and make a difference in the world. Now. We do it through the creation of breakthrough optical diagnostic devices and software services focused on early cancer detection and, soon, a range of other medical purposes. We deliver it at a cost that enables rapid uptake and wide utilization everywhere, but particularly in low-resource settings, where the need is most acute and the impact can be immediate.﻿

CodeMonkey is a fun and educational game-based environment where kids learn to code without any prior experience. After completing CodeMonkey's award-winning coding courses, kids will be able to navigate through the programming world with a sense of confidence and accomplishment.

Helparound aims to help chronic patients and their support systems, overwhelmed by a life-changing condition, to simplify the day-to-day of managing treatment by magically delivering the information and support resources they need, when they need them, through their smartphones.

PlanetWatchers is an all-weather geospatial analytics solution that maximizes the productivity of enterprise natural resource assets. By combining advanced machine learning algorithms and multi-source satellite sensors, PlanetWatchers delivers an intuitive and robust monitoring and alerting system that provides critical information for natural resource intensive enterprises.

The EyeControl is the first wearable, screenless, assistive communication device. AI-powered eye-tracking technology enables remote communication between ventilated ICU patients and medical staff via the nurse station. The EyeControl can also improve quality of life for Locked-in home care patients, by providing round-the-clock communication with family members and caregivers.

Exploiting sterility to win the battle against resistant weeds

WeedOUT brings a totally new strategy into the world of weed control by developing a novel biological herbicide to fight off resistant weeds. WeedOUT’s novel technology is based on the development of a unique proprietary weed pollen, which is applied during weed flowering period via artificial pollination to prevent the generation of viable resistant weed seeds.
Wasteless provides an all-in-one solution to reduce food waste and increase perishable food profit by dynamically pricing items with a shorter expiration date at their optimal price point.

C2C-NewCap is introducing a proprietary aqueous based supercapacitor into the market. Our company’s goal is to provide a better alternative to Lead-acid batteries and to have a high impact in the energy storage market and contribute to an efficient use of energy with lower environmental costs. We are currently running pilot tests with customers in USA, Europe and Asia, in the automotive industry, as well as in stationary applications such as generators for backup power.

COI Energy developed and deployed the first full service digital energy platform that connects utilities and businesses to detect, eliminate and monetize energy waste in buildings to optimize the grid. It provides real-time feedback and alerts, enabling businesses to monitor, manage and monetize BTM resources while utilities are able to better ensure the reliability and resiliency of the grid. We are creating a climate friendly economy for our children's children to live, work, play and thrive.

We have invented a scalable upcycling technique to turn air pollution/carbon emissions into industrial grade inks called AIR-INK. Conventionally, most black inks are made by using carbon black, which has a high environmental carbon footprint.

Due to its high-quality and negative carbon footprint, AIR-INK helps our B2B customers to help them meet their carbon, sustainable, and environmental goals through print and production, and boost brand value.

Cardiac pacemakers are battery-powered devices which require a replacement surgery every 5-7 years. This exposes the patient to increased risk of infection, cost and pain. VoltXon uses its new NanoGenerator and BioSuperCap technology to harvest and store the patient's body energy to power its revolutionary cardiac pacemaker for the patient's lifetime.

Today, the power to drive water desalination & recycling comes from environmentally toxic electricity generation plants. As the world's need for water becomes more and more urgent, desalination and recycling will become more necessary to obtain water from previously untapped sources. In order to protect the environment and address the growing water crisis, we have created a device that can supply electricity and clean water simultaneously while being driven by hydrogen instead of electricity.
An integrative system for water utilities to destroy per-and polyfluoro alkyl substances (PFASs) in drinking water cost-effectively.

Our planet is facing a significant threat of environmental disaster, we at Power2peer are creating a blockchain secured clean energy market place to enable home-owners with rooftop-solar systems to distribute clean energy to their neighbors. We are harnessing the rapidly growing homeowners solar market of $1 Billion/year in the US with 2.5 Million solar residential systems. Using our patent-pending AI-driven platform we will accelerate virtual solar grids and save the planet Earth.

Adaptive Balancing Power GmbH manufactures innovative flywheel energy storage systems that are highly efficient providing high power outputs at unlimited charge cycles. The technology is an economical and sustainable alternative for stabilizing power grids, increasing their resilience and efficiency. Target markets are: Microgrid Energy Storage Market, Railway Energy Recuperation Market, Ultra-fast Charging Market and Fast Frequency Response Market.

Algopoly helps companies solve large scale forecasting problems by implementing proprietary machine learning algorithms in their daily workflow. So far we have solved our clients' problems in energy, finance and logistics domains. We are more focused on energy on a utility-scale demand forecasting (how much electricity will a certain region use tomorrow?) and renewable energy production forecast. (how much electricity will a certain wind/solar farm produce tomorrow?)

We aim to displace diesel generation and fossil fuel based power plants and leapfrog grid infrastructure in the developing world using renewable energy and circular economy principles. Our solution, BRIC is the lowest costing and longest lasting li-ion battery system in the world.

No more Logistic, no more storage, no more toxicity. aquama® is a cleaning and disinfecting solution based on salty water electrified, which kills, viruses, bacterias, fungus we you are.Imagine if people in Asia and Italy would have had some aquama® machines around them. They would have been in a safer environment, even with a quarantine process. No need to store any disinfectant. Download the aquama® app, transfer your USD or CHF in an aquama® Token, take the control of a machine.

CO2 Free Truck develops a device to capture the CO2 emitted by diesel engines. It can be installed on heavy trucks, light trucks, ships or train. The CO2 is transformed in liquid CO2 and stored on vehicles and can then either be sold on the CO2 market or can be utilized as a carbon source for producing green fuel (methane or liquid fuels) by combining it with hydrogen produced from renewable energy resources.
CO2 Free Truck captures the CO2 emitted by truck and store it. The CO2 can then be sold on the CO2 market or transformed in fuel.

Hydrothermal Liquefaction, HTL, converts waste biomass into biocrude in a process in a fast process 600 s rather than millions of years. HTL has been known for more than 70 years, but Bio2oil brings in novel technology to make the process energy efficient even in small scale. Our unique heat and pressure exchange technology allow production of 10 times more energy as a liquid fuel than is used on the process in decentral modular units making biocrude e.g. at waste (water) treatment plants
Bio2oil develops scalable technology for decentral conversion of waste biomass to a stable crude oil upgradable to sustainable drop in fuels

Globally it has been observed that nearly 3 billion people in the developing world cook food with traditional cookstoves or open fires, resulting in negative social and environmental impacts. The solution to this challenge is Ecogel, a climate-smart ethanol fuel gel developed by Econexus Ventures Limited, a social enterprise commercializing innovative clean energy solutions in Ghana.

Domestic hot water is responsible for 20% of the energy consumed in buildings in developed countries and conventional distribution solutions based in recirculating loops waste more than 50% of this used energy. Hoterway thermal battery are installed in each room to instantly heat the water in pipes until the moment that hot water arrives. When hot water arrives the thermal battery start to recharge the heat used previously in order to restore the capacity for the next use.
Hoterway thermal battery provides instant hot water in buildings efficiently decreasing water and energy consumption.

Algobrix®, screen-free (patented), Tangible Programming Language exposes kids to coding and robotics through play, with its smart coding blocks. In 2017, we raised over $1.2M in crowdfunding pre-orders (not equity). During 2018, we joined forces with Young Engineers, an educational franchise network operating in over 50 countries ($2.5M in sales, 2019). During 2019, we completed the production line development, shipped & sold over 500 kits to Young Engineers franchise network.
Algobrix – The ultimate screen-free solution for teaching coding & robotics through play, with smart (Lego compatible) coding blocks

Urban gardens watered today using agriculture technologies that were not designed for gardens' needs. The result: clean water wastage, water runoff damages, and high maintenance cost.
SoliDrip develops a disruptive technology, a 100% autonomous irrigation device that always provides the optimal amount of water to each plant. Saving a substantial amount of clean water, and dramatically reducing urban gardens maintenance cost.
Our mission: Boost Urban Greening, helping mitigate CO2 emissions.
SoliDrip develop disruptive technology a 100% autonomous irrigation device that always provides the optimal amount of water to each plant

The wet-wipes industry yearly sales are $17B, with 5% AAGR. The economic and environmental damages are $1B.
WipeFlush is an Israeli-USA clean-tech startup created with a clear vision of developing a multi-application wipe that feels, looks AND COSTS like a regular wipe, but disperses like toilette tissue. This is the industries' HOLY GRAIL.
Our wipes are plastic-free, comply with circular economy principles, and with UN SDG's 6'9'12'14.
WipeFlush = Affordable, environment-safe wet-wipes
WipeFlush is developing a multi-application wipe that feels, looks AND COSTS like a regular wipe, but disperses like toilette tissue.

Asia’s 3.6 million manual scavengers jump neck deep into clogged sewers, scrape human faeces from dry toilets with their bare hands then carry it upon their heads for disposal. Outcasted and considered ‘untouchables' no one talks about this.

At HelpUsGreen, we employ women to collect floral-waste from temples that would otherwise be dumped into river Ganges. We produce and sell world's first biodegradable alternate to Styrofoam & animal-free leather made from the cellulose waste.
Pioneers of ‘flowercycling®’ technology to preserve rivers by converting river-pollutants into animal-free leather & biodegradable styrofoam

We provide PPC training alongside career workshops and an internship within digital marketing agencies. Interns gain valued skills, knowledge and work experience. Digital marketing agencies get the opportunity to do some good and first pick of great junior role candidates.
Jump.in is a talent hub for disadvantaged young adults to jumpstart a professional career in hi-tech.

At Study Rocket, we’ve decided to make all of our content totally free for everyone to use, forever. The site will now stay as it is and be open for anyone to use. Instead, the team are now focusing fully on building the amazing revision timetable app — Adapt.
What is Adapt?
Adapt is a dynamic A-level & GCSE revision timetable app that makes your plan for you. Having been designing Adapt since January, we’re currently building the app over the summer, launching a Beta in September and becoming open to you all in January.
Why?
We believe the real problem we can solve for students isn’t content (you already have tons of that) but disorganisation. After all, how many of you plan your revision on paper or a normal calendar only to find out you can’t stick to it?

At TechPixies we recognise that women require confidence in order to go back to work in fulfilling, stimulating careers, to upskill or to start a business.

We believe one of the best ways to gain confidence and therefore choice over your future is through education. 

Our Social Media Magic Course will help you to upskill and discover your sparkle!
